title.narrative: Yunnan Integrated Road Network Development Project

description.narrative: The impact of the Project is to develop an integrated road transport system that supports sustainable economic growth in Yunnan Province, part of the GMS. The outcome of the Project is improved road transport efficiency and safety in the project area. The Project will (i) reduce vehicle operating costs and travel time; (ii) improve access in the western part of Yunnan Province, part of the GMS; (iii) provide additional transport capacity to accommodate growing traffic; and (iv) provide improved access to jobs, markets, and social services in a poor area.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Average travel speed on improved local road is increased from 10-20 km per hour in 2010 to 30-40 km per hour in 2016

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area

title.narrative: Percentage of township roads in Dehong prefecture in good condition increased from 27% in 2008 to 50% by 2016

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area

title.narrative: Percentage of non-tolled ordinary roads managed by Yunnan Provincial Highway Bureau (YPHB) in good condition (pavement quality index superior to 80) increased from 35% in 2009 to 50% by 2016

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area

title.narrative: Average travel time by road from Longling to Ruili is reduced from 4 hours in 2010 to 2 hours in 2016

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area

title.narrative: Road accident fatalities per 10,000 registered vehicles in Yunnan (4.8 per 10,000 registered vehicles in 2008) are reduced by 10% in 2016

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, sustainable, and environment-friendly transport system developed in the project area
